name: Goldair
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Connect your Goldair App to Alexa to conveniently control you new Goldair smart fan or heater from the comfort of your armchair! 

If you have any problems whilst using the Goldair App, please email : info@cdb.co.nz or sales@cdbgoldair.com.au 

You can simply ask Alexa to turn on, turn off or adjust your heater or fan speed. 
There’s no need to get up to adjust your settings - just talk to Alexa on your Amazon Echo, Echo Dot, Amazon Tap or Echo Show. 

Connect Alexa to your Goldair Smart product in a few simple steps:
(1). Download our "Goldair" app in either the App Store or Google Play;
(2). Register your account in our "Goldair" app;
(3). Have your Goldair Appliance handy;
(4). Configure your appliance in our Goldair App and change the name of your device which will be used when using voice control.
(5). Download Amazon "Alexa" app from android, iOS or Amazon app market;
(6). Configure Echo with "Alexa" app;
(7). Search "Goldair" from the "Alexa" app skills category;
(8). Click Enable 'Goldair', and you'll be navigated to Goldair login page;
(9). Enter your Goldair account username and password, you'll be redirected to the confirmation page;
(10). You are now ready to use voice control. 

HEATING:
• Alexa, turn off <device name>
• Alex, turn on <device name>
• Alexa, set <device name> to 21 degrees
• Alexa, what's my <device name> set to?
• Alexa, What's the temperature in here?
• Alexa, turn on eco on <device name>.
• Alexa, turn on child lock on <device name>.
• Alexa, turn on oscillation on <device name>.

COOLING:
• Alexa, turn off <device name>
• turn on <device name>
• Alexa, set the <device name> speed to 7.
• Alexa, turn up the <device name> fan speed.
• Alexa, decrease the fan speed on the <device name> by 3.
• Alexa, what is the <device name> speed?
